VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Freight Train relative to Long-Haul Operators?
SRP.A: Freight Train is {below} Long-Haul Operators in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total driver satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Freight Train}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total driver satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Last-Mile Couriers}.

VE.Q: What is Last-Mile Couriers's Driver Satisfaction in 1984?
VE.A: Last-Mile Couriers's driver satisfaction in 1984 is {60.48} index.

VE.Q: What is Freight Train's Driver Satisfaction in 1977?
VE.A: Freight Train's driver satisfaction in 1977 is {86.02} index.

VE.Q: What is Freight Train's Driver Satisfaction in 1980?
VE.A: Freight Train's driver satisfaction in 1980 is {109.46} index.

VE.Q: What are the driver satisfaction of Long-Haul Operators, International Routes, and Last-Mile Couriers in 1987?
VE.A: Long-Haul Operators's driver satisfaction is {154.59} index, International Routes's driver satisfaction is {119.50} index, Last-Mile Couriers's driver satisfaction is {49.51} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Driver Satisfaction in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum driver satisfaction is {49.51} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Driver Satisfaction in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum driver satisfaction is {224.63} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Driver Satisfaction level recorded for Freight Train?
EVJ.A: Freight Train reached approximately {224.63} index in {1987}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Driver Satisfaction level recorded for Freight Train?
EVJ.A: Freight Train's lowest recorded level is approximately {75.38} index in {1976}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Driver Satisfaction?
SC.A: The average total driver satisfaction is {415.28} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Driver Satisfaction exceed 459.17 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

Which years did the total Driver Satisfaction go below 359.98 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Driver Satisfaction in 1977 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total driver satisfaction in 1977 was {lower} than in 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1987, was the average total Driver Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1978 and 1981?
NC.A: The average total driver satisfaction between 1978 and 1987 was {higher} than between 1978 and 1981.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1984, did the total Driver Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1982 and 1983?
NC.A: The change in total driver satisfaction between 1981 and 1984 was {larger} than between 1982 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1986, was the average total Driver Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1982 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total driver satisfaction between 1985 and 1986 was {higher} than between 1982 and 1987.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Freight Train} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Last-Mile Couriers, International Routes, Long-Haul Operators, Freight Train}.
